TopicTitle: Copy from old threads the text in OpenOffice shows the missing images

Articles.Content:
When i copy the text from it (see below example), in a OpenOffice 4.1.1 file, shows the missing images + text.

Example :
[url]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/10224-0-15-Parts-Dynasat-Satellites-and-Solar-Panels-new-parts!-%28rel-0-6%29-Jun-11?highlight=older+release[/url] Edited November 24, 2015 by roarke

I explained better.
